creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: wrap, accordion pleated skirt with 5 3/8" blue waistband and long ties; tie-dyed blue on white with center horizontal 2 1/2" band in geometric batik pattern; some appliqued embroidery in red and brown; below waistband is narrow white braid sewen to pleats
title: Skirt
